repnme.cdata!:
Argentina - Health Insurance Technical
            Assistance Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The assessment of outcome is
            satisfactory, sustainability likely, and the institutional
            development impact substantial. Lessons convey the technical
            assistance work of this project was essential, in that it
            fostered its adjustment operations, which includes the
            legal, regulatory, and institutional changes, as well as the
            financial conditions on health insurance conversions. As
            well, the value lies in the up-to-date health sector work,
            as the analytical foundation for this combined adjustment,
            and technical assistance operation, which as it happened,
            coincided with the country's fiscal crisis, thus
            providing the opportunity for financial adjustment. During
            this particular crisis, and political turmoil, the fact that
            intense supervision was provided, helped focus on political
            developments, and adapt the project design to changing
            circumstances. However, the reform process needs strong
            support from high levels of civil society, which implies
            deep cultural changes, and a meaningful consultation among
            the government, the implementing agency, and in particular,
            civil society and stakeholders.
